forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms during the morning will give way to steady rain this afternoon. High 8C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers this morning, then overcast during the afternoon with occasional rain. High 47F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. Decreasing clouds overnight. Low 4C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Periods of light rain early. Low near 40F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then becoming windy with a steady light rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then becoming windy with a steady light rain overnight. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy. Rain showers early, with overcast skies later in the day. High 52F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial clearing expected late. Low 46F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 61F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 59F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High near 55F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 5C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 42F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 12C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 55F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low near 5C. Winds NE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 41F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 14C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 57F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 8C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 46F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 14C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 58F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds NE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 49F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 58F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 8C. Winds NE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 48F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.
